title: Google assistant not working while driving
content:
Whenever I drive and say "Hey google" the assistant pops up, however, it does not respond to anything after that. It's like it can't hear me. I don't know if this is a problem with having google maps open or something else. 
Please help as the assistant is quite important for me while I drive.
Thanks
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 5
